lead_paragraph: PGA Tour rookie Chesson Hadley survived a late charge from Danny Lee to win the $3.5 million Puerto Rico Open by two strokes on Sunday.

headline.main: Hadley Survives Late Lee Charge for PGA Tour Win
headline.print_headline: Hadley Survives Late Lee Charge for PGA Tour Win

snippet: PGA Tour rookie Chesson Hadley survived a late charge from Danny Lee to win the $3.5 million Puerto Rico Open by two strokes on Sunday....
